name: Chunky Button Ribbed Lace Scarf
description:
* Measurements (approx): 100cm x 15.5cm 
* Material: 100% Wool
*Care Recommendation: Cool handwash in wool detergent and dry flat in shade 

This will be made to order especially for you and the button may differ somewhat to what is shown due to availability of materials - this can take up to 2 weeks before being shipped but for current waiting times please contact me.

Want a specific size, colour or style? Don't like wool? I can custom make so let me know what you want :)

name: Covertible Turban Headband
description:
This is an awesome convertible crochet headband! Wear it turban style or plain! Perfect as a stylish fashion accessory and practical for those windy days to keep your hair in place or the wind out of your ears. 

Available in 50% Cotton and 50% Acrylic which is perfect for the warmer weather or 100% Wool to keep your ears toasty warm in the chilly wind!

Designed to fit most - stretch to fit and closes with a vintage button at the back. 

Washing:

Cotton Blend- Cool Gentle Machine Wash

Wool - Cool Hand Wash in Wool Detergent

Colours listed are ready to ship! Other colours can be made to order to please ask if you're interested.

name: Wool Winter Lace Slouchy Beret + FREE Detachable Flower!
description:
Fabulous hand crochet winter lace slouchy beret style beanie made from 100% Wool and designed to fit most women. 

FREE Vintage Button Detachable Flower Brooch included - these are usually $10 when sold individually!

Because the buttons are vintage, the one you receive may differ to the ones pictured as they are unique and hard to find!

Cold Handwash in Wool Detergent.

These are made to order, for current waiting times please contact me.  

Many other colours are available by request :)

name: Black Vintage Buckle Headband
description:
This awesome one of a kind headband is hand crochet out of 100% wool in black and has a STUNNING detailed vintage gold metal buckle! 

Stretch to fit most women.

Hand Wash Only.
